report design

Description:
NPE throws out when oepn a report including crosstab which created in former build.

Build number: 
2.3.0.v20071203-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1, Download the attached report design
2, Open it in v20071203-0800 build

Or, create a crosstab in the build which is before 20071203 build and open it in v20071203 build.

Expected result:
The report can be opened successfully

Actual result:
NPE throws out.

Created an attachment (id=84384)
new report design

This issue has not been fixed completely, the crosstab using library still has the same backward issue. These two report designs are from Automation framework, it will lead a Automation case failed. So reopen it.
Add Automation in summary, for no need to auto this case again.

This remaining issue is duplicate with bug 211553.
